findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions isTokenStakedByUser(), unstake(), _claimStakingRewards(), getCurrentStakingRewards() and getStakedTokensOfOwner() use a loop to iterate through stakedTokens list, which may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the list is too long.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges during a certain period, allowing them to perform various sensitive actions such as minting trial NFTs, calling external functions, changing deposit amounts, withdrawing funds, pausing/unpausing the contract, and modifying referral/user profit percentages.
